Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: (\{ "\$(npc) \{assaults\|jumps\|charges\|attacks\} \$(target), its teeth bared in a \{snarl\|growl\}.\|\$(npc) \{assaults\|jumps\|charges\|attacks\} you, its teeth bared in a \{snarl\|growl\}!" \})

(\{ "\$(target) \{barely\|narrowly\|easily\|methodically\|calmly\} \{avoids\|keeps out of reach from\|stays clear of\} \$(npc)'s \{teeth\|claws\|teeth and claws\}.\|You \{barely\|narrowly\|easily\|methodically\|calmly\} \{avoid\|keep out of reach from\|stay clear of\} \$(npc)'s \{teeth\|claws\|teeth and claws\}." \})

(\{ "\$(npc) \{sinks its teeth into\|shoves its razor-sharp claws into\|digs its teeth into\} \$(target)'s \{leg\|foot\|hip\|arm\|hand\|flesh\}.\|\$(npc) \{sinks its teeth into\|shoves its razor-sharp claws into\|digs its teeth into\} your \{leg\|foot\|hip\|arm\|hand\|flesh\}!" \})

(\{ "\$(npc) \{easily\|narrowly\|barely\|indifferently\|calmly\} \{jumps out of the way from\|avoids\} \$(actor)'s weapon and \{chatters\|spits\|hisses\} \{furiously\|angrily\|murderously\|bloodthirstily\|enragedly\}.\|\$(npc) \{easily\|narrowly\|barely\|indifferently\|calmly\} \{jumps out of the way from\|avoids\} your weapon and \{chatters\|spits\|hisses\} \{furiously\|angrily\|murderously\|bloodthirstily\|enragedly\}." \})

(\{ "\$(actor) manages to \$(desc) \$(npc), which \{staggers\|stumbles\|cowers back for a moment\|retreats for a moment\}, wounded.\|You manage to \$(desc) \$(npc), which \{staggers\|stumbles\|cowers back for a moment\|retreats for a moment\}, wounded." \})

Notes:Category.Notes:Note: This is an example BDO for the fighting-fake NIP library. As you can see, there are quite a few behavior situations, but each situation only has a single entry, made more varied via the use of inline {one|ofs}. Each entry additionally uses the audience\|actor feature, to make emits more accurate.
